fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to watch over tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will take action if your target would:
> - Come into harm because of their visit.
> - Appears to kill themselves (either through a direct self-attack, sucide, delayed attack, or Astral attack)
> - Be crushed by their vulnerabilites.
- You will perform the only the first listed action for this night only to save the player from their tragic fate:
> - Prevent all other visits to your target.
> - Grant your target Powerful defense.
> - Heal your target.
> - Console your target and convince them to not commit suicide.
> - Grant your target Invincible defense.
> - Astralize their visit.
> - Grant your target Overprotective defense.
> - Prevent their visit altogether.
